com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.argument
Class ComparableArgs

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.kevinarpe.papaya.argument.ComparableArgs

@FullyTested
public final class ComparableArgs
extends Object

Static methods to check Comparable arguments.

See ObjectArgs for an overview.

Author:
Kevin Connor ARPE (kevinarpe@gmail.com)

Method Detail

checkValueRange

@FullyTested
public static <T extends Comparable<T>> T checkValueRange(T ref,
                                                                      T minValue,
                                                                      T maxValue,
                                                                      String argName)
Tests if a Comparable reference is not null and its value within specified range.

Parameters:
ref - an object reference
minValue - minimum value (inclusive)
maxValue - maximum value (inclusive)
argName - argument name for ref, e.g., "strList" or "searchRegex"
Returns:
the validated object reference
Throws:
NullPointerException - if ref, minValue, or maxValue is null
IllegalArgumentException -
  • if minValue > maxValue
  • if value of ref is outside allowed range
See Also:
ObjectArgs.checkNotNull(Object, String), checkMinValue(Comparable, Comparable, String), checkMaxValue(Comparable, Comparable, String), checkExactValue(Comparable, Comparable, String)
